summary: human metapneumovirus (hMPV) is a paramyxovirus similar to respiratory syncytial virus. hMPV is primarily known as a causative agent of respiratory tract infections in children. the virus can also cause respiratory infections in adults. est X-ray showed cardiomegaly and diffuse opacity in both lower lungs. electrocardiogram showed atrial fibrillation with a normal ventricular response. echocardiography showed slightly decreased systolic function with a small amount of pericardial effusion.
